name: Doggerfall
description:
Doggerfall - This is an adventure game about a cute dog named Dogger, he has to walk around the neighborhood of his home in order to eradicate a terrible threat that hangs over him.

The game was inspired by the old Zelda. Here you have to visit impenetrable forests, viscous and viscous swamps and dark ancient caves filled with terrible vampires. Overcome traps and enemies, collect items to upgrade items, solve puzzles and help Dogger save his home.
